name: Super Toboggan Challenge [Commodore 64]
description:
It is time to enter the wacky world of winter sports. Super Toboggan Challenge has is all: barriers, trees, broken ice,  and much more - making this a really wild ride.

TND Winter Sports has built a single track which runs on infinitely. You have been given the opportunity to be the first competitor to take on the course. There is a slight catch though ... The course has been badly constructed, but for strange reason it has been passed by health and safety officers.

Your task is guide your toboggan through the course and pick up the flags. Rake up as many points as you possibly can. If you crash into the side barriers, logs, trees, buildings or fall into the water. Your challenge ends here.

How high can your boost your score before you smash into something?

Good luck competitior.

Controls
Use joystick in port 2

Credits:

Programming, Graphics and Music by Richard Bayliss
Tape Loader by Martin Piper

(C)2019 The New Dimension

This game is freeware. You are welcome to copy it for free. However selling the game digitally or physically without permission from TND games is forbidden.

Super Toboggan Challenge was written as part of the 6th chapter of the Assemble It game C64Studio coding tutorial. Full tutorial and source code is available from the tutorial.
